# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of the receiver to use with a debugger.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Return Value

A string that describes the object for debugging purposes.

## Discussion

The debugger’s `po` command uses this property to create a textual representation of the object suitable for display in the debugger. The default implemention returns the same value as [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObjectProtocol/description]. Override either property to provide custom object descriptions.

## Describing Objects

- **description**: A textual representation of the receiver.
